title: Bots in ARAM = I deserve to dodge and not get time penalty
body: I really don't care if I wasted 2 (with 2 bots) other peoples time - why the hell should i play with bots in aram? smh. 9 minute queue wait over this.

replies.body: Regardless of 2 of the other players being bots, dodging a game still disrupts matchmaking and makes others wait longer. Dodging can essentially have some of the same outcomes as AFK's do, which is why you got the LPQ.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=OReF3Zuv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-20T21:50:56.294+0000)
>
> Regardless of 2 of the other players being bots, dodging a game still disrupts matchmaking and makes others wait longer. Dodging can essentially have some of the same outcomes as AFK's do, which is why you got the LPQ.

You know what's super disruptive in ARAM? Bots. What exactly is the system preventing that? I get bots in about 1 in 5 aram games, and it's absolutely ridiculous. I had a match today where my team had two bots, couldn't possibly win, and COULDN'T EVEN SURRENDER because the bots don't vote. Completely wasted match.
